title: MuleÂ® Execs: Cost optimization
description:
## Execs: Cost optimization

This Dashboard monitors the resources available and not available through time per organization, helping you to identify how are being used faster.

Works by selecting the Id of your resources in variables section.

requests.q: sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:0.1,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*0.1+sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:0.2,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*0.2+sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:1,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*1+sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:2,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*2+sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:4,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*4+sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:8,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*8+sum:ioconnect.mulesoft.anypoint.cloudhub.applications.workers.active{workers_weight:16,$productionEnvironment} by {org_id}.rollup(max, 60)*16
